languages.text: "Я {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}не склонен{/d} к излишним сантиментам. Каждый агент Золотого Трона готов принести себя в жертву, если такая необходимость возникнет. Каждый агент Золотого Трона заменим. Незаменимы лишь результаты наших усилий — например, сообщение о том, что оплоту Человечества что-то угрожает".

"I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}not inclined{/d} to display excess sentiment. Every agent of the Golden Throne is willing to sacrifice themselves if the need arises. Every agent of the Golden Throne can be replaced. What cannot be replaced are the results of our efforts, such as a message reporting that a bulwark of Humanity is under threat."
languages.original_text: "Я {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}не склонен{/d} к излишним сантиментам. Каждый агент Золотого Трона готов принести себя в жертву, если такая необходимость возникнет. Каждый агент Золотого Трона заменим. Незаменимы лишь результаты наших усилий — например, сообщение о том, что оплоту Человечества что-то угрожает".

traits.locale_text: "I am not inclined to display excess sentiment. Every agent of the Golden Throne is willing to sacrifice themselves if the need arises. Every agent of the Golden Throne can be replaced. What cannot be replaced are the results of our efforts, such as a message reporting that a bulwark of Humanity is under threat."

What cannot be replaced are the results of our efforts, such as a message reporting that a bulwark of Humanity is under threat."

What cannot be replaced are the results of our efforts, such as a message reporting that a bulwark of Humanity is under threat."

Every agent of the Golden Throne can be replaced. What cannot be replaced are the results of our efforts, such as a message reporting that a bulwark of Humanity is under threat."

languages.text: “我并{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}不愿意{/d}表现出不必要的多余情绪。只要帝国需要，黄金王座的每位代理人都愿意自我牺牲。每位代理人都可以被取代，唯一无法取代的，只有我们共同努力的成果。比如说，关于人类的堡垒正面临威胁的情报。”
languages.original_text: "I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}not inclined{/d} to display excess sentiment. Every agent of the Golden Throne is willing to sacrifice themselves if the need arises. Every agent of the Golden Throne can be replaced. What cannot be replaced are the results of our efforts, such as a message reporting that a bulwark of Humanity is under threat."

traits.locale_text: “我并不愿意表现出不必要的多余情绪。只要帝国需要，黄金王座的每位代理人都愿意自我牺牲。每位代理人都可以被取代，唯一无法取代的，只有我们共同努力的成果。比如说，关于人类的堡垒正面临威胁的情报。”

languages.text: «{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}Prefiero no expresar{/d} sentimientos innecesarios. Todos los agentes del Trono Dorado estamos dispuestos a sacrificarnos de ser necesario. Todos nosotros somos reemplazables. Sin embargo, los resultados de nuestros esfuerzos no se pueden reemplazar, como, por ejemplo, un mensaje que informe de que un baluarte de la Humanidad está en peligro».
languages.original_text: "I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}not inclined{/d} to display excess sentiment. Every agent of the Golden Throne is willing to sacrifice themselves if the need arises. Every agent of the Golden Throne can be replaced. What cannot be replaced are the results of our efforts, such as a message reporting that a bulwark of Humanity is under threat."

traits.locale_text: «Prefiero no expresar sentimientos innecesarios. Todos los agentes del Trono Dorado estamos dispuestos a sacrificarnos de ser necesario. Todos nosotros somos reemplazables. Sin embargo, los resultados de nuestros esfuerzos no se pueden reemplazar, como, por ejemplo, un mensaje que informe de que un baluarte de la Humanidad está en peligro».

languages.text: 「我は感情を大げさに表現する{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}つもりはありません{/d}。黄金の玉座のエージェントは皆、必要があれば自らを犠牲にする覚悟があります。そしてまた、黄金の玉座のエージェントはそれが誰であっても交換可能です。交換不可な者は、その努力の結果です。そして、人類の防波堤が脅威にさらされていることを報告するメッセージもその1つなのです」
languages.original_text: "I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}not inclined{/d} to display excess sentiment. Every agent of the Golden Throne is willing to sacrifice themselves if the need arises. Every agent of the Golden Throne can be replaced. What cannot be replaced are the results of our efforts, such as a message reporting that a bulwark of Humanity is under threat."

traits.locale_text: 「我は感情を大げさに表現する{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}つもりはありません{/d}。黄金の玉座のエージェントは皆、必要があれば自らを犠牲にする覚悟があります。そしてまた、黄金の玉座のエージェントはそれが誰であっても交換可能です。交換不可な者は、その努力の結果です。そして、人類の防波堤が脅威にさらされていることを報告するメッセージもその1つなのです」

languages.text: « Je ne suis {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}pas du genre{/d} à verser dans le sentimentalisme. Chacun des agents du Trône d'Or n'hésitera pas à se sacrifier si le besoin s'en fait ressentir. Chacun des agents du Trône d'Or peut être remplacé. Ce qui ne peut être remplacé, en revanche, c'est le résultat de nos efforts, comme un message indiquant qu'un rempart de l'humanité est menacé. »
languages.original_text: "I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}not inclined{/d} to display excess sentiment. Every agent of the Golden Throne is willing to sacrifice themselves if the need arises. Every agent of the Golden Throne can be replaced. What cannot be replaced are the results of our efforts, such as a message reporting that a bulwark of Humanity is under threat."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne suis pas du genre à verser dans le sentimentalisme. Chacun des agents du Trône d'Or n'hésitera pas à se sacrifier si le besoin s'en fait ressentir. Chacun des agents du Trône d'Or peut être remplacé. Ce qui ne peut être remplacé, en revanche, c'est le résultat de nos efforts, comme un message indiquant qu'un rempart de l'humanité est menacé. »

languages.text: "Ich {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}neige nicht{/d} zu unnötigen Gefühlen. Alle Agenten des Goldenen Throns sind bereit, sich bei Bedarf selbst zu opfern. Alle Agenten des Goldenen Throns sind ersetzbar. Nicht ersetzbar sind die Resultate unserer Bemühungen, wie etwa die Meldung, dass ein Bollwerk der Menschheit bedroht ist."
languages.original_text: "I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}not inclined{/d} to display excess sentiment. Every agent of the Golden Throne is willing to sacrifice themselves if the need arises. Every agent of the Golden Throne can be replaced. What cannot be replaced are the results of our efforts, such as a message reporting that a bulwark of Humanity is under threat."

traits.locale_text: "Ich neige nicht zu unnötigen Gefühlen. Alle Agenten des Goldenen Throns sind bereit, sich bei Bedarf selbst zu opfern. Alle Agenten des Goldenen Throns sind ersetzbar. Nicht ersetzbar sind die Resultate unserer Bemühungen, wie etwa die Meldung, dass ein Bollwerk der Menschheit bedroht ist."

languages.text: "Aşırı duygusal davranma {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}eğiliminde değilimdir{/d}. Altın Taht'ın hizmetindeki herkes, gerektiği anda kendini feda etmeye hazırdır. Altın Taht'ın hizmetindeki her bir bireyin yeri doldurulabilir. Yeri doldurulamayacak olan, çabalarımızın sonuçlarıdır. Aldığımız mesaj, İnsanlığın bir kalesinin tehdit altında olduğunu söylüyor."
languages.original_text: "I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}not inclined{/d} to display excess sentiment. Every agent of the Golden Throne is willing to sacrifice themselves if the need arises. Every agent of the Golden Throne can be replaced. What cannot be replaced are the results of our efforts, such as a message reporting that a bulwark of Humanity is under threat."

traits.locale_text: "Aşırı duygusal davranma {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}eğiliminde değilimdir{/d}. Altın Taht'ın hizmetindeki herkes, gerektiği anda kendini feda etmeye hazırdır. Altın Taht'ın hizmetindeki her bir bireyin yeri doldurulabilir. Yeri doldurulamayacak olan şey, çabalarımızın sonuçlarıdır. Aldığımız mesaj bize, İnsanlığın bir kalesinin tehdit altında olduğunu söylüyor."
